title: Create frontend user service
description: Create frontend/src/lib/services/user.service.ts with methods: getProfile(), updateProfile(data), changePassword(data), deleteAccount(). Use axios with JWT auth headers. Follow existing services pattern (e.g., instagram.service.ts).
dod: Method getProfile() fetches user profile data
Method updateProfile(data) updates name, timezone, language
Method changePassword(data) updates password with current password verification
All methods use axios with JWT auth headers
Proper TypeScript types for request/response data
Service follows existing patterns in codebase
